title: Can we please fix tanks
body: I played a game where the other team had a Gragas full tank build and a Maokai with only an ROA for damage and the rest tanky and they just walked over our team no matter how much Armor pen we got, we couldn't get through front line and if we tried to get a little tanky, we couldn't kill the carries. How the fuck are you supposed to deal with that bullshit? Its literally impossible to get through. Something needs to give. Either tanks need to be nerfed or they need to give damage some help. In a 5v5 team fight it was impossible for us to win because of their tanks. NOT FUCKING POSSIBLE. Fucking fix something.

replies.body: Yeah i dont undestand complaining about tanks being hard to kill. Your not supose to kill the tanks first. If you are a briuser you try to get around them. If you are a mage you blow up the guy behind them if you are a adc you shoot them if you are a tank you ignore them or peel them. A mage shouldnt burst them a bruiser shouldnt hurt them and a adc should take at least 6-7 seconds to kill them will free fire

well take adcs for example. tanks can build tanky fast because they are cheaper items and bulldoze most adcs before they can be strong enough to lifesteal/fight back, but with the season 6 changes adcs are going to be the ones steamrolling tanks.

I don't think its fucking fair that it is so impossible to kill them that you can't win. We got a 5 man Yasuo ult off of my Wukong ult and it barely tickled their team as a whole. They were impossible to kill and just ran around as 5 because they knew they were impossible to kill. There has to be balance to that otherwise what is the point of this fucking game?

So all 5 of them were Maokai and Gragas with 6 tank items? Well, I wish them good luck scratching your towers. Or you. Or your minions. OR ANYTHING ELSE. Seriously, a Maokai with ROA and 5 tank items does about as much damage as 2 caster creeps. Two very durable caster creeps. If you really did get a 5 man Yasuo ult on an actual team, the squishies would have been fucked for sure. The Wukong ult + Yas ult damage alone is more than enough to kill them. Also, YASUO HAS 50% FUCKING ARMOR PEN ON HIS ULT.

True full tanks are in a horrible spot right now, Juggernauts are the reason they are getting a bad rep.
